name: Slayer’s Protection
entries: Starting at 7th level, you project an aura that protects those around you from the attacks from your Slayer's Quarry.Whenever a fiend, undead, or your Slayer’s Quarry forces a creature that benefits from your Aura of Protection class feature to make a saving throw they can add a 1d4 to the roll.A number of creatures equal to your Charisma modifier can benefit from this effect at once.
At 18th level, the d4 increases to a d6.
